articles.title: Can Sarah Ferguson, the Duchess of York, bounce back one more time? - BBC
articles.description: Her links to sex offender Jeffrey Epstein seem much harder to resolve than previous mistakes.
articles.content:
Sean CoughlanRoyal correspondent
The Duchess of York has so far been the great survivor of the royal world, bouncing back from embarrassments that would have sunk many others.

articles.title: Disney reinstates Jimmy Kimmel after suspension over Charlie Kirk remarks - BBC
articles.description: The late-night comic's show will return to air after Disney said it had "thoughtful conversations" with him.
articles.content:
US comedian Jimmy Kimmel will return to his late-night talk show on Tuesday after he was suspended for making jokes relating to the death of conservative influencer Charlie Kirk.

articles.title: Sean "Diddy" Combs has served enough time behind bars where he's been under constant suicide watch, defense tells judge - CBS News
articles.description: Combs faces an Oct. 3 sentencing after his conviction by a Manhattan jury on two charges that outlaw interstate commerce related to prostitution.
